response.summary:
I have over ten years of experience in the development and industrialization of new responsible and sustainable technologies.
I enjoy working in challenging environments and making a difference in the world. Today, the waste management industry is changing rapidly. I am being part of this shift with Akanthas proposing a smarter, cleaner and more efficient industry.  

https://www.akanthas.com/
response.skills: Process Simulation, Renewable Energy, Process Modeling, Chemical Engineering, Process Optimization, Project Management, Environmental Issues, Aspen, Aspen HYSYS, Matlab, English, French, Spanish, Research and Development (R&D), Chemical Process Engineering, Process Design

profile_positions.description:
Let's talk about your waste management challenges !
Together be part of the transformation !

We develop and commercialise a digital solution based on artificial intelligence allowing industries (manufacturing, construction, etc.) and haulers/recyclers to control waste storage and trace their containers anywhere.

Our technology is based on an intelligent and autonomous image sensor installed on site to measure and analyse the rate and nature of the filling of dumpsters, storage areas... Our artificial intelligence models then reformulate key metrics and recommendations to support decisions.

Make possible the reduction of your operating costs (transport, sort, valorisation) and your carbon footprint.
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer & Co-founder

profile_positions.description:
In charge of identifying technical requirements, providing scientific and experimental support and proposing new control strategies in the process, 
Developed protocols for testing microbiological performances and transfer capacity of gas injection systems,
Used Matlab and Gproms to develop modelling and simulation tools for the process,
Contributed to effectively communicating technical and commercial activities with a wide range of people at national and international events,
Aided senior staff and management identifying new and key strategic partners.
profile_positions.title: RD Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Took responsibility of developing a new green process to valorise carbon dioxide resulting from anaerobic digestion into high-value products,
Developed advanced tools to understand and optimise the process,
Awarded 1 patent for the novel process,
Managed 4 engineering interns, resulting in new strategies to lead the process,
Presented research results to the scientific community and to industrial partners,
profile_positions.title: Doctoral Researcher

profile_positions.description: Support and supervision of practical work in process engineering (distillation, liquid-liquid extraction and chemical reaction)

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Quality Engineering Manager

company.name: Akanthas
company.description:
Akanthas est portée par la conviction que 100% des déchets du secteur industriel  et de la construction sont valorisables en agissant à la source !!

Pour cela, Akanthas digitalise la production des déchets grâce à une solution breveté basée sur l'IA. Cette technologie de pointe mesure et analyse les déchets afin de rendre les opérations de collecte, transport et traitement : efficaces, économiques, et durables. 

Vous voulez en savoir plus ?
Rendez-vous sur : www.akanthas.com
